function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Community planning ignoring new technological elements","Impact":"Inadequate community services and lack of adaptation to residents' changing needs","Mitigation":"Integrate new technological elements into community planning and prioritize non-contact interaction activities","Technologies":"Smart city technologies, non-contact service systems","People":"Community residents","Owner":"Urban planners and community authorities"},{"Description":"Neglecting the impact of COVID-19 on community lifestyle changes","Impact":"Failure to meet residents' new lifestyle and service needs, increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Conduct surveys to understand the impact of COVID-19 on community lifestyle changes and adapt community planning accordingly","Technologies":"Digital surveys and data analytics for lifestyle trends","People":"Community residents, urban planners","Owner":"Public health authorities and urban planning departments"},{"Description":"Dependence on non-contact interactive activities leading to social isolation","Impact":"Increased social isolation and impact on mental well-being of residents","Mitigation":"Balance non-contact interaction activities with opportunities for in-person socialization and community engagement","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, virtual social gatherings","People":"Community residents","Owner":"Community organizations and mental health professionals"}]}
